title: Mobile-Based Practical Arabic Communication Skills Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing the acquisition of immediately applicable Arabic communication skills for practical settings, aiming to support tasks for local guides (Umrah Tour Guide) and travelers

learning_goals: Accurately apply over 50 Arabic workplace expressions (e.g., tourism guidance, emergency response) by context using mobile applications
Achieve over 80% accuracy in recognizing 28 Arabic phonemes through speech recognition and pronunciation assessment
Score over 80/100 in weekly formative assessments on workplace-related Arabic conversation simulations
Engage in peer language exchange activities based on practical scenarios at least twice weekly in mobile learning communities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
